item.title: Smooth video playback with subtitles on Raspberry PI 4
item.description: A few weeks ago I decided it was time to replace my ageing 2007 Macbook Pro I had been using for watching movies on my big living room TV with something newer. Something that can play H.264 videos without the fan going into overdrive, and H.265 videos, well, at all… The new Raspberry Pi 4 seemed to fit the bill quite nicely with its hardware decoding support for H.265 (4kp60) and H.
